verbose_text: Further, we revealed that this effect is due to VDR mediated transcriptional activation of the inflammatory chemokine CXCL8, stimulating cell-autonomous regulation of HSPC expansion and viability via CXCR1/2 activity.
evidence: VDR-mediated transcriptional activation of the inflammatory chemokine CXCL8, stimulating cell-autonomous regulation of HSPC
